item.title: Snippets
item.description: I’m torn between Bytestash and Opengist for my snippets repository. I love Opengist’s clean and simple design, but Bytestash’s robust search functionality is hard to overlook.
item.content:encoded: I’m torn between Bytestash and Opengist for my snippets repository. I love Opengist’s clean and simple design, but Bytestash’s robust search functionality is hard to overlook.
